summary: A shout that turns people into cheese.
descriptionHtml:
A shout that turns people into cheese wheels of either type (6 to 30 default). To get the shout, go to Whiterun and "activate" the lower cheese wheel on the stall in the market. Aim at someone and use the shout to turn them int[size=1]o[/size] a cheese. WARNING, they will never turn back, they will be gone forever (so use it on someone like Nazeem) or just go crazy, whatever, I don't really care.

OH YEAH I FINALLY UPDATED WOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!

NEW:[font=Trebuchet MS][size=2]
[/size][/font][list][*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2]Sound - CHEESE FOR EVERYONE whenever you fire.[/size][/font][/*]
[/list][list][*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2]﻿Explosions - You can pick them up too (Because I have no idea how to fix this and I think it's kinda cool anyway).
[/size][/font][/*]
[*][size=2][font=Trebuchet MS]Projectile - You fire a cheese wheel into them to turn them into cheese.[/font]
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][font=Trebuchet MS]Globals - [/font][/size]Whether you want it to essential kill, [/*]
[/list]                      ﻿Min and max cheese made,
                      Explosion AoE (currently works for 0-1000, 0 only hits who you shoot it at).
[size=2] [/size]
Currently makes everyone hostile and adds a bounty (40 maybe?), if I get complaints I'll remove it.

Manual Install:
[list=1][*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2]﻿Place all the files in your Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\Data folder.
[/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2]﻿Make sure cheeseshout.esp is checked in the launcher.[/size][/font]
[/*]
[/list]
Steam version: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=10747
author: Drokiconix
